import React, { useState, Fragment ,useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { createProfile,getCurrentUser } from '../../actions/profile'; import { useDispatch ,connect} from 'react-redux'; const EditProfile = ({userProfile:{profile,loading}, history }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', youtube: '', linkedin: '', instagram: '' }); const [dispaySocialLink, toggleSocialLink] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(() => createProfile(),()=>getCurrentUser()); console.log('profile props',profile) console.log('loading props',loading) useEffect( ()=>{ dispatch(getCurrentUser()); setFormData({ company:loading || !profile.company ? '':profile.company, website:loading || !profile.website ? '':profile.website, location:loading || !profile.location ? '':profile.location, status:loading || !profile.status ? '':profile.status, skills:loading || !profile.skills ? '':profile.skills.join(','), githubusername:loading || !profile.githubusername ? '':profile.githubusername, bio:loading || !profile.bio ? '':profile.bio, twitter:loading || !profile.social ? '':profile.social.twitter, facebook:loading || !profile.social ? '':profile.social.facebook, youtube:loading || !profile.social ? '':profile.social.youtube, instagram:loading || !profile.social ? '':profile.social.instagram, linkedin:loading || !profile.social ? '':profile.social.linkedin, }) },[loading]); //destructuring const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, instagram, youtube } = formData; const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createProfile(formData, history,true)); }; return (

Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{dispaySocialLink && (
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
)} Go Back
); }; const mapStateProps = state=>({ userProfile:state.profile }) export default withRouter(connect(mapStateProps)(EditProfile));
